text: Tyancyapaiki jila tumhi icchita asala dura rakha ani jila icchita asala apalya javala theva ani jara tumhi tyancyapaiki ekhadila apalya javala bolavuna ghyala, jyanna tumhi vegale karuna thevale hote, tara yata tumhala kahi harakata nahi. Yadvare ya gostici adhika asa balagali ja'u sakate ki ya (striyam) ce netra sitala rahaveta ani tya duhkhi na vhavyata ani tumhi je kahi tyanna dyala tyavara tya sarva raji khusi rahatila. Tumacya manata je kahi ahe te allaha cangalya prakare janato. Allaha motha jnana balaganara sahanasila ahe
